description: This is a FastAPI router module implementing REST API endpoints for managing 'data' items stored in a MongoDB database. It provides functionalities such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting data items with support for filtering, pagination, and sorting.

methods.name: _get_coll_or_503()
methods.description: Internal helper function to retrieve the MongoDB collection or raise a 503 HTTP exception if unavailable.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,int]] _build_projection(fields: Optional[List[str]])
methods.description: Constructs a MongoDB projection dictionary from a list of fields to include.

methods.name: Optional[List[Tuple[str,int]]] _build_sort(sort_by: Optional[str], sort_dir: Optional[str])
methods.description: Constructs a MongoDB sort specification list based on provided sort field and direction.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _normalize_filter(raw_filter: Optional[Dict[str, Any]])
methods.description: Normalizes filter input, converting string IDs to ObjectId where applicable.

methods.name: DataItemsPage list_data( filter: Optional[str] = Query( default=None, description="JSON string for MongoDB-like filter. Example: {"data.country": "US"}", ), fields: Optional[str] = Query( default=None, description="Comma-separated fields to include in the response. Example: data.name,data.age", ), sort_by: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Field to sort by."), sort_dir: Optional[str] = Query(default="asc", pattern="^(asc|desc)$", description="Sort direction."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max items to return."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip."), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list data items with filtering, projection, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: DataItemOut get_data_item(item_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a single data item by its ObjectId.

methods.name: DataItemOut create_data_item(payload: DataItemIn)
methods.description: Creates a new data item with the provided payload.

methods.name: DataItemOut update_data_item(item_id: str, payload: DataItemIn)
methods.description: Updates the 'data' field of an existing data item by its ObjectId.

methods.name: None delete_data_item(item_id: str)
methods.description: Deletes a data item by its ObjectId.

ctags.name: list_data
ctags.signature: ( filter: Optional[str] = Query( default=None, description="JSON string for MongoDB-like filter. Example: {"data.country": "US"}", ), fields: Optional[str] = Query( default=None, description="Comma-separated fields to include in the response. Example: data.name,data.age", ), sort_by: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Field to sort by."), sort_dir: Optional[str] = Query(default="asc", pattern="^(asc|desc)$", description="Sort direction."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max items to return."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip."), )

ctags.name: update_data_item
ctags.pattern: /^async def update_data_item(item_id: str, payload: DataItemIn) -> DataItemOut:$/
